#summary Describes the philosophy behind the design of the automation protocol

The automation protocol is used to expose a tree of callables and
properties on the automation server.

 * svn_revision
 * get_name
 * clock
   * now
   * nowtext
   * weekday
   * hour
   * minute
   * second
 * temp
   * current
   * heater
   * readtemp
   * readvoltage
   * setpoint
   * day
     * temp
     * clock
   * night
     * used
     * temp
     * clock
